Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to forfeiture of a beneficiary's right to benefits upon conviction of domestic violence offense
Summary: Imposes the forfeiture of a beneficiary's right to benefits upon conviction of domestic violence offense where the victim of such crime is the member for which he or she is a beneficiary.
LawCode: Add ยง111-b, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to forfeiture of a beneficiary's right to benefits upon conviction of a domestic violence offense
